room.name: Inn
room.description: You are in an inn. There is a man at the front desk that you should give money to.

room.name: Courtyard
room.description: You are in a large grassy courtyard. To your north there is an inn and to your west there is a well.

room.name: Well
room.description: You are at a wishing well. On the ledge of the well you see a penny. Maybe you should pick it up.
